name: Literally Just Car Kirby
description:
What if Nintendo went for a completely different approach with Kirby and the Forgotten Land?
This is a game just about Car Kirby that we received in a parallel universe. It's a little arcade-style racing game.
Race around as your favorite character completing objectives in his ultimate form.

Making of Video! If you are interested in the development of the game, I have a making of video up on my YouTube Channel.

Features
  • 5 unique levels
  • A Boss fight

Controls:

FunctionKeyboardMoveWASD / Arrow KeysDriftSpaceBreakLeft ShiftQuit levelEscapeRestart LevelR
